channel.title: Theres just that one case
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm looking for one packet in particular.. I really don't have a clue what it does, im guessing it is something to do with "Clicking".
I remember a while back i found this packet; and i put inside it a teleportation method, then whenever you clicked anywhere it would just teleport you somewhere else.
Some people, i think, use this for freezing people if they having done something. I'm not sure. But asd explained above, i think it is a packet which ahppens when you click to move.
Does anyone have an idea which ID this packet is? Thanks!
EDIT:
Think i found it myself, packets; 164 and 98.

item.title: Theres just that one case
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Hey guys,

I’m looking for one packet in particular…
I really don’t have a clue what it does, im guessing it is something to do with “Clicking”.

I remember a while back i found this packet; and i put inside it a teleportation method, then whenever you clicked anywhere it would just teleport you somewhere else.

Some people, i think, use this for freezing people if they having done something. I’m not sure. But asd explained above, i think it is a packet which ahppens when you click to move.

Does anyone have an idea which ID this packet is?
Thanks!

Think i found it myself, packets; 164 and 98.
